sinaiticus.text: The elder to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all that have known the truth,

verses.text: The elder to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all that have known the truth,

sinaiticus.text: because of this truth that abides in us, and shall be with us for ever.

verses.text: because of this truth that abides in us, and shall be with us for ever.

sinaiticus.text: There shall be with you grace, mercy, peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

verses.text: There shall be with you grace, mercy, peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

sinaiticus.text: I rejoiced greatly that I have found of thy children walking in the truth as we received commandment from the Father.

verses.text: I rejoiced greatly that I have found of thy children walking in the truth as we received commandment from the Father.

sinaiticus.text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as writing to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

verses.text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as writing to thee a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

sinaiticus.text: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments: the commandment is this: as you heard from the beginning, that you walk in it.

verses.text: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments: the commandment is this: as you heard from the beginning, that you walk in it.

sinaiticus.text: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh: this is the deceiver and the antichrist.

verses.text: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh: this is the deceiver and the antichrist.

sinaiticus.text: Take heed to yourselves, that you lose not the things that you have wrought, but that you receive a full reward.

verses.text: Take heed to yourselves, that you lose not the things that you have wrought, but that you receive a full reward.

sinaiticus.text: Whoever advances and abides not in the teaching of Christ has not God: he that abides in the teaching, he has both the Son and Father.

verses.text: Whoever advances and abides not in the teaching of Christ has not God: he that abides in the teaching, he has both the Son and Father.

sinaiticus.text: If any one comes to you, and brings not this teaching, receive him not into the house, and wish him not well;

verses.text: If any one comes to you, and brings not this teaching, receive him not into the house, and wish him not well;

sinaiticus.text: for he that wishes well is partaker in his evil deeds.

verses.text: for he that wishes well is partaker in his evil deeds.

sinaiticus.text: Having many things to write to you, I would not by means of paper and ink; but I hope to be with you, and speak mouth to mouth, that our joy may be full. Epistle of John 3rd
